answers.answer: Well I have gestational diabetes so it's best for me to eat every 2-3, no longer than 3 (if I can help it). I eat my 3 main meals (breakfast, lunch, and dinner) with snacks in between. I, personally, think as long as not every meal is a full course dinner and you are eating snacks (i.e. fruit or granola bars) then I don't see the problem, but that's just my opinion. Have you mentioned it to you doctor and see what they say?
I eat every two hrs so my sugar won't drop.  I eat small meals and healthy snacks in between
I eat small meals and snacks every two hours,  but that's how I've always eaten.

Not yet I see her next week to ask her I was just seeing if it was normal to get hungry every 2 hours. I feel like if I'm hungry I should eat at least snacks. Maybe I'm not eating enough for breakfast lunch and dinner......
I have to eat every two hours like clock work. If I dont I get a headache, nauseous and my daughter goes crazy like she knows my schedule.

question: How often are you ladies eating? I swear I get hungry every 2 to 3 hours I'm convinced babygirl is stealing my food and saving it for the winter lol
title: How often do you eat?
